member.name: T:MatrixMath
member.summary: Public Class Matrix Math with Shear2D Method

member.name: M:MatrixMath.Shear2D(System.Double[0:,0:],System.Char,System.Double)
member.summary: Public Shear2D Method where we factor in the shear onto the matrix, moving through the x or y axis and transform the matrix.
member.returns: new matrix or -1 if matrix is not of correct size
